Description: A flexible pipeline for genome-resolved metagenomic data analysis
EDAM_operation: Read binning, Sequence assembly, Genome annotation, Sequence trimming, Demultiplexing
EDAM_operation_(no_superclasses): Read binning, Sequence assembly, Genome annotation, Sequence trimming, Demultiplexing
EDAM_topic: Whole genome sequencing, Metagenomic sequencing, Metagenomics
EDAM_topic_(no_superclasses): Whole genome sequencing, Metagenomic sequencing, Metagenomics
bio.tool_description: MetaWRAP aims to be an easy-to-use metagenomic wrapper suite that accomplishes the core tasks of metagenomic analysis from start to finish: read quality control, assembly, visualization, taxonomic profiling, extracting draft genomes (binning), and functional annotation.
